analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CommonSale.mintBounty (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol#498-503):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(bountyTokensWallet,bountyTokensCount * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol#500-503)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bountyMinted (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol)

CommonSale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol#475-498) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol#489-490)
	-token.mint(foundersTokensWallet,foundersTokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol#498)

CommonSale.mintBounty (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol#498-503) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(bountyTokensWallet,bountyTokensCount * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol#500-503)

CommonSale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol)

CommonSale.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(multisigWallet,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/14/0x742686bb1b136b396b59818f42e47a4fc3509394.sol#1): it allows old versions
